A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie was a train wreck\, without counting the Mary Sue aspects that continue in this film and the lack of logical plot development I feel that the dragged the story out just to attempt to cover a bunch of bases (i.e. trying to give Finn a purpose).
Some of the SNAFU's Disney let slip without spoilers:
1) Gravity for bombs in a zero g space battle
2) Lack of outer space strategic planing for both the empire and rebels\, leading to people never launching fighters to fight fighters\, using hyperspace to cut off fleeing ships\, letting smaller ships jump away for no reason without pursuit\, etc.
